import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Recoverpassword() { const [matchpass,setmatchpass]= useState("red") const [credentials,setcredentials] = useState({email:"",OTP1:null,OTP:localStorage.getItem("OTP"),password:""}) const matchpassword =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() if(document.getElementById("pass1").value===document.getElementById("pass2").value){ setmatchpass("green") } else { setmatchpass("red") } } return ( <>
